Defendant stopped by Officer Reyes, driver of the black truck, exhibited nervous behavior during the stop, claimed the vehicle belonged to his aunt and then his cousin, transported to a checkpoint for further questioning, contends that Officer Reyes exceeded the scope of a traffic stop, subject to an 'unlawful arrest' without probable cause
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hugo Benavides: United States Border Patrol Agent who arrived at the scene of the traffic stop, presented himself, inquired into Defendant's citizenship and travel plans, awaited the results of the canine search, transported Ignacio Rodriguez to the checkpoint for further questioning
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Reymundo Reyes: Officer who conducted a traffic stop of Ignacio Rodriguez, issued a citation, informed him that the vehicle could not continue to its destination, present when Agent Benavides arrived at the scene
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Marco Montemayor: Special Agent for the United States Department of Homeland Security involved in investigating an attempted alien smuggling event, interviewed Ignacio Rodriguez around 11:30 p.m. after he was transported to the checkpoint
